Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{3: 'The transport craft makes a slow descent, touching down at a plaza.'}
{3: 'The plaza is nestled between two mountains, with a highway stretching out from it.'}
{3: 'This place looks really hidden from a distance.'}
{3: 'The plaza was clearly built for Golden Age fighter jets, suggesting that this "Dark Room" was designed with combat in mind.'}
{3: "Lucia starts scanning the area's Punishing Virus concentration after getting off the transport craft."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, the Punishing density is higher than the data Lee sent back a few days ago.', 4: '1', 18: '100006280'}
{2: "Looks like Hutu's intel was right.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I should look around first.', 4: '1', 18: '100006281'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'The comms loss is worrying—this looks serious. 【kuroname】, do you need backup?', 4: '1', 18: '100006282'}
{3: 'The transport craft pilot opens the cockpit window and leans out, asking a question.'}
{2: "As usual, call for backup if we don't report in 24 hours.", 3: '23'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Alright, be careful and keep us posted.', 4: '1', 18: '100006283'}
{3: 'The transport craft takes off slowly, leaving the area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The entrance looks to be over there.', 4: '1', 18: '100006284'}
{3: 'Ishmael points to a huge door at the base of the mountain ahead of the plaza.'}
{3: 'The door is built into the mountainside as if a giant spoon scooped out a chunk of rock. The main "Dark Room" structure is underneath the mountain.'}
{3: 'The massive door is firmly closed, separating the inside from the outside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Doesn't look like anyone's broken in from outside.", 4: '1', 18: '100006285'}
{2: "Something's definitely off, but don't jump to conclusions yet.", 3: '36'}
{2: "Let's wait and see what Lucia finds.", 3: '37'}
{3: 'While you wait, Ishmael asks you a question.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Lee's lost comms, and it's clearly more dangerous than the briefing said...", 4: '1', 18: '100006286'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Why are we turning down the pilot's help?", 4: '1', 18: '100006287'}
{3: 'She sounds curious. Not a loaded question, just a casual, friendly chat—like friends catching up.'}
{3: 'Strangely, she starts to feel familiar to you, as if you have known each other for a long time.'}
{2: "Missions like this aren't uncommon to Gray Raven.", 3: '43'}
{3: 'She repeats the last part softly.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Is this your daily routine now?', 4: '1', 18: '100006289'}
{2: 'Not entirely.', 3: '47', 4: "It's only part of it.", 5: '47'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm really interested in your story.", 4: '1', 18: '100006290'}
{3: 'Unprompted, she says it before getting quiet.'}
{3: 'Just as you start to get confused, Lucia comes back from scouting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No signs of anyone breaking in around here. Punishing Virus levels are normal, too.', 4: '1', 18: '100006291'}
{2: "Internal incursion... That doesn't make sense.", 3: '57', 4: "They could've gotten in through other entrances.", 5: '57'}
{2: "There's no way a facility like this only has one entrance.", 3: '60'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You're right, 【kuroname】, there'd be other ways in. But those records are gone.", 4: '2', 18: '100006294'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The Control Court only got some of the records. We don't know where the other entrances are.", 4: '2', 18: '100006295'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Hutu probably held back some info to keep himself safe.', 4: '2', 18: '100006296'}
{2: "So he doesn't fully trust Babylonia...", 3: '65'}
{3: 'After searching the area, you find a hidden small door on a far mountainside.'}
{3: 'You cannot force the door open, but you find a control panel hidden behind the rocks next to the door after a while.'}
{3: 'Since Liv is out and Lee is not here, you have brought a decryption device just in case.'}
{3: 'Lucia looks at you after checking the panel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The decryption device needs about 20 minutes...', 4: '1', 18: '100006297'}
{2: 'Do you have enough computing power?', 3: '76', 4: "You've got a decryption system installed?", 5: '76'}
{3: 'It would be quicker to have a Construct handle the decryption directly.'}
{3: 'Ishmael walks up to the panel and skillfully initiates the decryption process.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It'll take about... two minutes.", 4: '1', 18: '100006300'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Hmm... Looks like someone from the base tweaked the system.', 4: '1', 18: '100006301'}
{2: "(That's some serious computing power...)", 3: '86'}
{3: 'Cutting the decryption time by almost ten times—few in the Task Force have that level of power.'}
{3: 'Ishmael does not seem worried about revealing some of her cards.'}
{3: 'Two minutes later, the door cracks open.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{3: 'Inside, you find a large, open warehouse area with various vehicles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's weapons and gear... Looks like they're ready to go.", 4: '1', 18: '100006303'}
{2: "Let's head to the elevator first.", 3: '99'}
{3: "Based on Hutu's data, the underground base has 20 floors total, with B7 to B14 as living areas. They were on B12 at the time."}
{3: 'Investigating where they spent the most time is the easiest way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory70.jpg'}
{3: 'Going through the warehouse, you see the elevator bay ahead of you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, Hetero-Creatures spotted.', 4: '1', 18: '100006305'}
{3: 'Two medium-sized Hetero-Creatures are wandering near the elevator bay.'}
{2: "Let's go—I'll take the left. You take the right.", 3: '114'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Hetero-Creatures turn to the three of you, roaring. They have definitely picked up your traces.'}
{2: '(Raise gun and fire at the Hetero-Creature on the left)', 3: '119'}
{3: 'BANG—BANG—BANG—'}
{3: 'As the fight starts, Lucia immediately speeds up, charging the Hetero-Creature on the right like a fast, low-flying gray raven.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The frost fades as Lucia takes down the Hetero-Creature quickly and cleanly.'}
{3: "At the same time, your bullets hit the left one perfectly, exploding when they hit the Hetero-Creature's torso."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm seeing something here...", 4: '1', 18: '100006307'}
{3: 'Ishmael stops at the elevator bay.'}
{3: 'One elevator stands out from the others.'}
{3: 'The elevator door is ripped open, with a big pool of blood in front. Three bodies lie on the ground, laid out from the elevator.'}
{2: "They're armed—not just regular citizens.", 3: '134'}
{2: 'Judging by how they fell, they were trying to get outside.', 3: '135'}
{2: 'There are signs that they were attacking backward.', 3: '136'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This elevator got trashed, looks like from the inside.', 4: '1', 18: '100006308'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Hmm... They came up in the elevator, and then Hetero-Creatures chased them up the shaft?', 4: '1', 18: '100006309'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This happened... less than an hour ago.', 4: '1', 18: '100006310'}
{3: 'After a quick look at the markings on the floor, Ishmael concludes.'}
{2: 'So the Punishing Virus did come from the inside?', 3: '142'}
{3: 'That smile of hers... For a second there, you get the feeling that Ishmael knows exactly what is coming.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, I found this thing on one of them.', 4: '1', 18: '100006312'}
{3: 'What Lucia has found is a Babylonia-made storage device.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee must've dropped it.", 4: '1', 18: '100006313'}
{3: 'You plug the device into your terminal, and a video starts playing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, I'll give you the situation report from here.", 4: '1', 18: '100006314'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I left this video on a bunch of different paths, making sure you'd find it.", 4: '1', 18: '100006315'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Following the mission intel, I came to this base to talk to Hutu, their leader, and we had a good exchange.', 4: '1', 18: '100006316'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But something unexpected happened earlier—a group of Hetero-Creatures showed up inside the base, mainly between B5 and B9.', 4: '1', 18: '100006317'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Communications are totally down here too.', 4: '1', 18: '100006318'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We've got way too many evacuees, so I'm helping them pull back to deeper levels, away from the Hetero-Creatures, so...", 4: '1', 18: '100006319'}
{3: 'He pauses for a moment.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's why I can't break free alone. I could only leave you a message this way.", 4: '1', 18: '100006320'}
{3: 'Even though he looks worried in the video, Lee keeps his cool and gives a quick rundown of what is happening.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Right now, we're at B12. Given our speed, we should hit B17 to B19 in about an hour or two, for temporary shelter.", 4: '1', 18: '100006321'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Then, the stronghold leader's going to leave you a message with some info about the place.", 4: '1', 18: '100006322'}
{3: 'Lee steps to the side, moving out of the frame as a man wearing Kowloong-style clothing walks into view.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hutu', 3: "I'm Hutu, this base's leader. I've been in touch with Babylonia before.", 4: '1', 18: '100006323'}
{3: 'He looks a little anxious.'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "Let's cut to the chase. I'm sending our best team to break out of here and get this video to you guys.", 4: '1', 18: '100006324'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: 'If you get this message, I hope you can bring more folks down here with you.', 4: '1', 18: '100006325'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "This base has its own defense system, which we've tweaked. If things get bad, we can use it to evacuate.", 4: '1', 18: '100006326'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "But now, something unexpected happened. The defense system kicked in on its own, and we've lost control.", 4: '1', 18: '100006327'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "The area between B6 and B7 is locked down tight. Nobody's getting out.", 4: '1', 18: '100006328'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "I'll get my people to go through the ventilation shafts to break through.", 4: '1', 18: '100006329'}
{2: 'Hutu', 3: "I hope you see this video... I can't let thousands of people die here.", 4: '1', 18: '100006330'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The video cuts off there.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The "Dark Room" itself has a security system in case of emergencies.', 4: '1', 18: '100006332'}
{2: 'Emergencies?', 3: '187'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It's meant to keep people or... something from getting out, I think. Basically, it seals everything off.", 4: '1', 18: '100006333'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The people in this base made use of the Dark Room's defensive system.", 4: '1', 18: '100006334'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'They tried to rewrite the system, but they did it poorly. They were trying to use it to defend against the Corrupted, but clearly...', 4: '1', 18: '100006335'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What should we do next, Commandant?', 4: '1', 18: '100006337'}
{2: 'Leave a message in case we lose contact.', 3: '194'}
{3: "Lee's comms are down. There is probably electromagnetic interference blocking the signals down here."}
{3: 'Hutu said floors B6 and B7 are locked, and Hetero-Creatures are all over B5 through B9, but the vents are pretty safe.'}
{2: "Let's take the elevator to B4 and descend through the vents.", 3: '198'}
{3: "According to Lee's intel, they are supposed to be taking shelter on B19."}
{3: 'The three of you enter the elevator and head to B4.'}
{3: 'You try to select floors below B7 on your way down, but they are indeed locked.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory343.jpg'}
{1: 'Emergency Stairwell', 2: 'Between B9 and B10'}
{3: 'You have not seen many Hetero-Creatures on your way, but you have encountered protective barriers in the stairwell on each floor.'}
{3: 'Lucia has been tearing down these barriers, so you are able to descend steadily.'}
{3: 'You keep going until you see a large "B10" written on the wall, where Ishmael stops.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It seems we'll have to part ways here for now, Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '1', 18: '100006338'}
{2: '...Because of your mission?', 3: '210'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Correct. My data says the Dark Room's control room is on B10.", 4: '1', 18: '100006339'}
{2: 'Can you handle the Hetero-Creatures?', 3: '212'}
{3: 'Ishmael says nothing, just giving you that enigmatic smile of hers.'}
{3: 'You remember that line in your mission briefing—you are "not responsible for the safety of the accompanying Control Court member".'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Don't worry... I can handle myself in a fight.", 4: '1', 18: '100006340'}
{3: 'Right as you are talking, a Hetero-Creature sneaks up from behind Ishmael.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Ishmael does not look back—she just takes a step to the left, dodging the Hetero-Creature's claws."}
{3: "In one move, she pulls out a pistol, turns, and fires—the bullet heading straight toward the Hetero-Creature's head."}
{3: "Ishmael's smile has not shifted a bit."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm a Construct, after all—my computing power can help me dodge a few attacks.", 4: '1', 18: '100006341'}
{3: 'The Hetero-Creature hits the ground with a thud.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Also, I can try to take back control of the "Dark Room\'s" defense system from the control room.', 4: '1', 18: '100006343'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Maybe I can even crack the sealed defense system... Who knows?', 4: '1', 18: '100006344'}
